metadata.title: USN-4595-1 -- Grunt vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Grunt did not properly load yaml files. An attacker could possibly use this to execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2020-7729)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4595-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  grunt - 1.0.1-8ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
